Sentencas: Standardization of fuel cell testing to allow comparisons presents one of the major challenges to the fuel cell community.
Titulo: Quality assurance and solid oxide fuel cell testing at Forschungszentrum Juelich

Sentencas: This becomes more critical when there is a need to take commercial decisions on the direction of the technology.
Titulo: Quality assurance and solid oxide fuel cell testing at Forschungszentrum Juelich

Sentencas: One part of the development toward such standardization is the formalization of what measurements are made and how they are made, including the control of external and environmental parameters.
Titulo: Quality assurance and solid oxide fuel cell testing at Forschungszentrum Juelich

Sentencas: This presentation details some of the elements of the standardized measuring system in place at Forshchungszentrum Julich (FZJ) and explains some of the rationale behind this system.
Titulo: Quality assurance and solid oxide fuel cell testing at Forschungszentrum Juelich

Sentencas: The established measurement system adopts many of the principles employed by generic international quality assurance standards and commercial organizations.
Titulo: Quality assurance and solid oxide fuel cell testing at Forschungszentrum Juelich

Sentencas: An analysis of the testing process identifies critical control points, e.g., those parameters that must be controlled to ensure internally consistent test results and repeatability.
Titulo: Quality assurance and solid oxide fuel cell testing at Forschungszentrum Juelich

Sentencas: The FZJ solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) testing process is illustrated by means of a flowchart.
Titulo: Quality assurance and solid oxide fuel cell testing at Forschungszentrum Juelich

Sentencas: This chart details critical control points and shows how the parameter measurements are documented in a systematic fashion.
Titulo: Quality assurance and solid oxide fuel cell testing at Forschungszentrum Juelich

Sentencas: Specific examples are given of SOFC test data to illustrate how FZJ determined some of the critical control parameter values used in our testing, those included are the effects of Ni-cermet reduction temperature, the ejf ct of the chosen time intervals between individual I-V measurement points, and finally, the effect of the hydrogen flow rate.
Titulo: Quality assurance and solid oxide fuel cell testing at Forschungszentrum Juelich

Sentencas: Standardization within the SOFC community can prove a contentious issue, but whatever standard test parameters are finally chosen by the community, to allow comparison of SOFC options organizations will have a need to introduce a well-designed, controlled, and formalized measurement system.
Titulo: Quality assurance and solid oxide fuel cell testing at Forschungszentrum Juelich

Sentencas: We have found that adopting a generic QA systems approach has been successful internally and recommend this option to other organizations.
Titulo: Quality assurance and solid oxide fuel cell testing at Forschungszentrum Juelich
